price: That is their recompense: Hell, because of their disbelief and taking My verses and messengers in ridicule.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ بِمَا كَفَرُواْ وَٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَايَٰتِي وَرُسُلِي هُزُوًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
